topic.title: Get The Truth About The Federal Reserve Bank And Geo Engineering Out !!!

topic.body: The United States MUST IMMEDIATELY start CREATING the currency and STOP borrowing it from the privately owned Federal Reserve Bank, which gives its Globalist owners UNLIMITED CURRENCY to totally bribe the government and finance criminal politicians! Also, NEVER pay back the 20 Trillion to the Federal Reserve, since this debt is Un Constitutional!
